Text: http://www.ponychan.net/chan/ep/res/754.html is the source thread.  It contains a few more eps than are here.
This torrent is perfect, but be sure to take the magnet link. The "download this torrent" link doesn't work."
New link: http://www.ponychan.net/chan/pony/res/754.html - today you can download from there all episodes up to 24th. Hopefully E25 and not yet aired E26 will be added there eventually.

In discussion to which I posted link above, link to 23th episode is not present in the first post but buried in comments. When I was looking for this missing episode I found better place to download all episodes including E23: http://ponies.asshat.se/
